Cache: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47273192/cache.rar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47273192/cache.rar[/url] ( if the link doesn't work its still uploading , cause the file is around 350MB ) [b]( Extract the cache in rscalifornia\data , or else it wont work )[/b]
Credits: ( Edited , happy now ? )
Me: 0.001% - For posting this `Tha Fuck: 0.99% - For fixing the anti-leech Arcik: 99.009% - For relasing the source
ORIGINAL THREAD: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547815.0.html ( Pictures , info , features , etc )

item.title: RS california 711 *Source fixed*
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

i don’t have a unpackedShops.txt in my items folder?

Anyone knows where to find it?

[code]last part go to data>items folder delete packedShops.s and open up unpackedShops.txt

u see the numbers down the side going from 1 to 21 make a new shop with the next number 22 995 is the shop currency = $ and then shop name then item id then stock amount.

In unpackedshops.txt file there will be a collum on the left with numbers from 1 to 22 these are how many shops there are already on the server. So when making a new shop you would put 23,24,25 ect…
so in npchandler.java u will be changing this code…[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: RS california 711 *Source fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Kr3m1in Kr3m1in
item.description:
@Kr3m1in wrote:

[quote=“tomato721, post:46, topic:445872”][quote author=Kr3m1in link=topic=548734.msg4023892#msg4023892 date=1340208818]

Let me clear something up: If somebody releases a server, then it’s clearly going to be re-released. Nobody has to give anybody permission. If you release your server, you should be doing it to share it. You’re under no obligation to remove that download link Naseem.

Thank god people understand this now. If you don’t want your work being leeched and re-released, don’t go cry to moderators that you were too stupid to delete the src folder…

lol then why release it if there was no src folder cuz u cant even change the name !

Because people sit here and bitch and moan about how their server is leeched and want it taken down when they practically handed them the source to leech. Yet they don’t complain if a more known person leeches it and adds a few simple things, then people love it, but otherwise they just scream “dood y u leech i no give u permisions i now claim mooney and shit noob”. It should be common seance that if you give someone something, that they’ll end up using it, not just let it sit there and waste hard drive space.

The best anti-leech is removing the src folder, so they’re forced to decompile the server witch most leechers won’t know shit about. Even after that though, it’ll probably still need some fixing.

You speak of common sense when you can’t seven spell ‘sense’.

These ‘leechers’ are just trying to learn. Give them a break.
[/quote]
these leachers are just trying to have fun making an rsps do u expect those leeched rspses made by people who dont even know how to change a nam e be sucessful?[/quote]

Jesus Christ, please speak some English. Your sentence is so cobbled I just gave up reading it.

Read full topic

Let me clear something up: If somebody releases a server, then it’s clearly going to be re-released. Nobody has to give anybody permission. If you release your server, you should be doing it to share it. You’re under no obligation to remove that download link Naseem.

[/quote]

lol then why release it if there was no src folder cuz u cant even change the name ![/quote]

Yet they don’t complain if a more known person leeches it and adds a few simple things, then people love it, but otherwise they just scream “dood y u leech i no give u permisions i now claim mooney and shit noob”.
